posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chuck P
I'm collecting one example of each 1910 back slogan.  Since I have two Convenient Sensible and two No Paste Used, I can trade either Ort or H.Smith .... and either Brinker or Burrell.  I also have two 1911 Obaks available to trade... Cooney and McArdle.

Here are the back slogans I need ...

Always a Pleasure 
Cigarettes of Quality 
Delicate Aromatic 
For Exacting Smokers 
High Quality 
Immensley Popular 
Instantly Popular 
Mais Paper Wrapper 
Marvelous Blend 
Mild and Pure 
Nothing Like Them 
Perfect Aroma 
Stand the Test 
Surpass Imagination 
The Story in the Smoking 

Note that the order is reversed from front to back (the left front matches the right back) in each row. Thanks for looking!

[IMG]http://home.comcast.net/~chuckparis/ObaksF.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://home.comcast.net/~chuckparis/ObaksB.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Chuck P
Cooney is gone but the others are still available.

I still need the backs listed except for Mild and Pure.
